Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Service: EC2 – increased from to 8 for both application server and web server
RDS - increased number of instances from 1 to 2
Route 53 - increased number of Elastic Network Instances from 5 to 10
VPC - increased number of NAT Gateways from 1 to 2. One per availability zone
Application Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (EC2 and IP)
Network Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (NLB for TCP)
Amazon CloudWatch – increased number of logs and metrics
